director.name: Olivia M. Lamasan Olivia M. Lamasan

introduction: The Mistress is a 2012 Philippine romantic melodrama film directed by Olivia Lamasan, starring Bea Alonzo and John Lloyd Cruz.[3]The film was also well acclaimed by people and received mostly positive reviews from the critics, and sets a box-office record in the Philippine Cinema. It currently holds the third highest grossing Filipino film of all time.[2] The film was also screened internationally in selected countries.[4]This film also celebrates the 10th year anniversary of John Lloyd Cruz and Bea Alonzo’s partnership as a love team.[5][6] Alonzo and Cruz also have their newest TV Show entitled A Beautiful Affair that currently airs in ABS-CBN, is also part of their 10th year anniversary as love team and also the success of The Mistress.
